io.amcp.core

Class DefaultAgentContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.amcp.core.DefaultAgentContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentContext

    public class DefaultAgentContext
extends Object
implements AgentContext
    Default implementation of AgentContext that provides agent lifecycle management, messaging capabilities, and resource management.
    Since:
    AMCP 1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      DefaultAgentContext(String namespace, EventBroker eventBroker)
